title: Jobs at Art Museums (JAM 2022): Writing
short_description: Learn how writers of all kinds contribute their skills to the museum.
header_description: JAM is a unique opportunity for college students to make professional connections and learn about careers in the museum field.
list_description: Learn how writers of all kinds contribute their skills to the museum.
description:
Learn how writers of all kinds contribute their skills to the museum.

Speakers:
Hillary Wiedemann, Assistant Director of Institutional Relations, Development

Loren Wright, Interpretation Specialist, Interpretation

Nancy Chen, Educator of Innovation and Creativity, Learning and Public Engagement

Participation by museum staff and departments does not indicate a need to hire. Staff will not be accepting resumes or offering interviews. For questions, email universitypartners@artic.edu.
